name: I don't endorse Wikipedia
author: Andrea Pernici

sections.description:
Automatically add a rel=”nofollow” to all links going to Wikipedia’s page inside your wordpress posts.

More info:

  • More info on I don’t endorse Wikipedia, with info on how to configure it.
  • Check out the other WordPress plugins by the same author, and follow him on the: SEO Blog.

Changelog

1.0.2

  • Compatibility check

1.0.1

  • Compatibility check and user fix

1.0.0

  • Release
sections.installation:
Download, Upgrading, Installation:

Upgrade

  1. First deactivate I dont’t endorse Wikipedia
  2. Remove the nofollow-wikipedia directory

Install

  1. Unzip the nofollow-wikipedia.zip file.
  2. Upload the the nofollow-wikipedia folder (not just the files in it!) to your wp-contents/plugins folder. If you’re using FTP, use ‘binary’ mode.

Activate

  1. In your WordPress administration, go to the Plugins page
  2. Activate the “I don’t endorse Wikipedia” and you’re fine.

If you find any bugs or have any ideas, please mail me.
sections.faq: Please before asking question read post and comments here https://www.andreapernici.com/wordpress/nofollow-wikipedia/
